hero.title: Making the Internet
hero.subtitle: Feel Better
hero.text: For every dreamer, creator, and change-maker tired of the old internet, Web3 is here. ENS is more than a protocol – it's a commitment to a better web, built for everyone.

features.title: Your name
features.text: Your ENS name is anchored in Web3, but works across the internet. It’s your identity: simple, memorable, unmistakably yours.
